title: Palace v West Brom from 12.45pm - LIVE
text: Crystal Palace v West Brom from 12.45pm in the Premier League - LIVE 1 unseen new items This stream will update automatically. 13:34 — matt maher (@mjmarr_star) October 3, 2015 13:34 Albion's corner is delivered by Brunt but referee blows for a foul on Kelly by Chester, who almost talks his way into a yellow card. — matt maher (@mjmarr_star) October 3, 2015 13:34 — matt maher (@mjmarr_star) October 3, 2015 13:34 Zaha has done his best to break the deadlock but #wba have remained disciplined at the back, despite the loss of Evans. — matt maher (@mjmarr_star) October 3, 2015 13:34 — matt maher (@mjmarr_star) October 3, 2015 13:34 — matt maher (@mjmarr_star) October 3, 2015 13:23 — matt maher (@mjmarr_star) October 3, 2015 13:22 Palace appeals for a penalty as Gayle tumbles under Brunt's challenge. Ref Jon Moss waves them away. — matt maher (@mjmarr_star) October 3, 2015 13:19 Puncheon's delivery, from the right, is cleared. Palace send in a few more crosses before Cabaye shoots wide. — matt maher (@mjmarr_star) October 3, 2015 13:19 — matt maher (@mjmarr_star) October 3, 2015 Tap to see all updates in full screen.
